instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1707 820-00281 OS problem
threads.message: I have this card that works perfectly the only thing that in the Monterey installation once you enter the password, it tells me that it can't install an update and doesn't keep me

threads.title: A1707 820-00281 OS problem
threads.message:
Is propably better to keep previous macOS version.
Just in case, check if accepts Ventura.

threads.title: A1707 820-00281 OS problem
threads.message: I did a test with an external drive with high Sierra installed and it did the same thing, it just goes into safe mode

threads.title: A1707 820-00281 OS problem
threads.message:
Try known good BIOS.
Failure in macOS upgrade caused problems many times.

threads.title: A1707 820-00281 OS problem
threads.message: I try to do a restore in dfu mode, if I possibly want to replace u4200 I can use a 820-00928 donor, I'm afraid that part is affected by corrosion

threads.message:
